title: Randomly Latency
body: In combat or while I am csing. League of Legends is the only application lagging. This has been happening to others too. I go from like 70 ping to like 300 just from attacking creeps and champions. How can you not fix this problem yet?

replies.body:
I checked our NA servers and I don't see any records or service issues. Most players that experience issues with latency are able to remedy the issue by [**configuring local network settings**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) for League compatibility. 

If you experience further issues with your latency in-game after taking those steps, let me know.
